Summary: I saw a landed UFO at Wright Patterson.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the AF base on a tour for a field trip wuth CAP when I asked our tour guides where Hanger 18 was. I was joking but the younger officer looked at the older officer who told him, more than me "NO." The younger officer smiled at me and said: "you read too many comic books!" Later in the tour we were looking at some KC-135's in a real hanger and I and another cadet slipped off. we walked to the hangar next door and went down some stairs( there were just cubicles up top)and were stopped by two guys who put us back with our group. i cant finish this report i have to go now, bye!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wright Patterson AF Base
This sighting has never been favorited.
